description:
A woman entrusts a man with a mysterious mansion. A rich man makes a deal with a kappa to make a bridge. A girl`s soul enters another`s body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Village of Nightingales / The Rich Man and Gatarou / The Soul That Went into a Different Girl
Uguisu no Sato / Chouja to Gatarou / Betsu no Musume ni Haitta Tamashii
うぐいすの里 / 長者と河太郎[がたろう] / 別の娘に入った魂
